00051   class TableIdentifierCopy : public TableIdentifier {
00052   public:
00053     TableIdentifierCopy(const TableIdentifier *identifier) : m_name(identifier->name) {
00054       id = identifier->id;
00055       generation = identifier->generation;
00056       name = m_name.c_str();
00057     }
00058     TableIdentifierCopy(const TableIdentifier &identifier) : m_name(identifier.name) {
00059       id = identifier.id;
00060       generation = identifier.generation;
00061       name = m_name.c_str();
00062     }

00064       m_name = identifier.name;
00065       id = identifier.id;
00066       generation = identifier.generation;
00067       name = m_name.c_str();
